bio:
Travel Photographer.
Ambassador: @smugmug, @stellerstories; @lonelyplanet Pathfinder.
🌏 ~70 countries. Based in London & Belfast.
✉️ hi@thefella.com

list.comment:
At The Beach House | Saksun, 🇫🇴 Faroe Islands

One of my top two houses in the entire Faroe Islands. (The other being the red house at Velbastaður). The title is like a less cool version of At The Drive-In.
_____________
#f8workshops #f8faroeislands @visitfaroeislands #visitfaroeislands #discoverearth #mytinyatlas
_____________
thefella.com

Arch Nemesis | Vágar, 🇫🇴Faroe Islands

REJOICE! We have workshops! Coming up next year, I still have some spaces on my Scotland (April) and Faroe Islands (May) workshops, alongside the amazingly organised, @zobolondon and someone else I know, @photojbartlett. Check out @f8workshops, or the link in my bio, or try your hand at being an internet Sherlock Holmes and search it online. Also, in this photo, you can see a tiny Zoe.
____
#f8workshops #f8faroeislands #visitfaroeislands #discoverearth #discoverer #guardiantravelsnaps #resourcetravel #mytinyatlas

Eilean Donan | Highlands, 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿Scotland
///rush.rather.depth

I’m not long back from a final scouting mission around the Highlands and Isle of Skye in Scotland for my photography workshop with @zobolondon and @photojbartlett next April. Check out @f8workshops, or the link in my bio for details and booking! This is Eilean Donan Castle, one of the stops along our way.
____
#f8workshops #f8scotland #visitscotland #scotlandisnow #discoverearth #discoverer #guardiantravelsnaps #resourcetravel #mytinyatlas

Tre Cime | The Dolomites, 🇮🇹 Italy

We still have tickets left for our @f8workshops in The Dolomites: 28th Oct - 3rd Nov 2018! Join me, @photojbartlett, and @zobolondon. You can head to f8workshops.com or click the link in my bio! Also stay tuned to my Instagram, as I'm off on a pretty cool adventure tomorrow!
____
#f8workshops #discoverearth #discoverer #passionpassport
#guardiantravelsnaps #resourcetravel #mytinyatlas

Slieve Bearnagh | Mournes, 🇮🇪🇬🇧 Northern Ireland

As I’ve been spending time in Northern Ireland recently, here’s a shot from one of my favourite viewpoints in the Mourne Mountains. Slieve Bearnagh looks like an exploded volcano from this angle. If anyone wants any photography lessons or workshops in N.I., let me know!
I’ve also had a busy time with conferences. I was recently speaking and teaching in Jersey in partnership with @visitjerseyci, @think_tourism, and @whalar(alongside my friends @rontimehin, @cinepix, @jorgo_k, @shisodelicious, and others). Then I was back home for #STSBelfast with @discoverni, @tourismireland, @lovegreatbritain, and many more friends. (I also appeared on @brendanvanson's podcast). Phew. Just letting everyone in socialmedialand know that I'm still alive!
____
#discoverearth #discoverer #passionpassport
#beautifuldestinations #guardiantravelsnaps #resourcetravel #mytinyatlas

Mulafossur | Gásadalur, 🇫🇴 Faroe Islands

I’ve not yet posted a photo of this village/mountain/waterfall this year, despite being such an amazing location. I keep thinking I’ll get bored of seeing this place, but then every time it’s slightly different and still quite majestic. We were starting to leave this location, when a clear bit of sky started to appear and the clouds wrapped around the mountain as they passed.
_____________
#f8workshops #f8faroeislands @visitfaroeislands #visitfaroeislands #discoverearth #mytinyatlas
_____________
thefella.com

New Workshops! | The Dolomites, 🇮🇹 Italy

I'm pleased to announce that we at @f8workshops have released three new workshops, starting with an amazing adventure in The Dolomites in Northern Italy: 28th Oct - 3rd Nov 2018! It'll be me, @photojbartlett and @zobolondon. You can head to f8workshops.com or click the link in my bio.
____
#f8workshops #discoverearth #discoverer #passionpassport
#guardiantravelsnaps #resourcetravel #mytinyatlas

Deeper Underground | Istanbul, 🇹🇷 Turkey

I spent the weekend in Istanbul joining in some Ramadan celebrations with @inflowsummits. It was so much fun learning about Turkish and Islamic culture, with such a mix of wonderful people. They from all over the world, including some Muslims from the UK, Indonesia and Texas, plus my good Sikh friend @harjinderkukreja and his family. Plus yours truly, a white Irish atheist 🙋🏻‍♂️. This photo is of Şerefiye Sarnıcı, a cistern that was used to store huge amounts of water underground. Thanks to @gitasav for being patient and modelling for me. And thanks to @thegrandtarabyahotel and @turkishairlines!
_____________
#RamadanInIstanbul #INFLOWsummits
#discoverearth #mytinyatlas
